fields.name: Raise Cattle (Passive):
fields.value: You may invite players to the server, who may immediately join the game. Every player who joins the game this way receives the TWOW Cow (Post 216) role.

fields.name: Butcher:
fields.value: ** If your target is a TWOW Cow with the Fatten Up passive triggered, you will attack them.

fields.name: Cattle Bell (Passive):
fields.value: You have access to a factional chat with all TWOW Cows. Only you may speak in this chat.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win and exit the game once you have butchered three TWOW Cows; or, win if you survive after having butchered two TWOW Cows.
